column4: i have downloaded just now a display from here "http://www.gnome-look.org/content/download.php?content=91089&id=1&tan=29744831" but i dont know how to install it can any one tell me
i have downloaded just now a display from here "http://www.gnome-look.org/content/download.php?content=91089&id=1&tan=29744831" but i dont know how to install it can any one tell me
assuming you have Ubuntu and not E or Kubuntu,  then right click on your desktop, select to change background, hit customize at the bottom,  then Pointer, the last tab
then you can drag and drop the file you downloaded, over to that window where the pointers are shown
